document.full_text: the syrian ambassador to france, lamia shakkour, denied resigning from her post early wednesday morning and said that she had been the victim of disinformation intended to embarrass syria.
document.title: middle east: syrian envoy to france denies resignation
lines_and_colors: the syrian ambassador to france, lamia shakkour, denied resigning from her post early wednesday morning and said that she had been the victim of disinformation intended to embarrass syria.
